instruction.value: DAY 1 of 21. Administer dose diluted in 500 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 3 hours. Start infusion at 100 mL/hour for 15 minutes, then resume ordered infusion rate.

DAY 1 of 7. Administer dose diluted in 100 to 250 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 1 hour. Invert bag gently approximately 6 times prior to administration. Use a non-DEHP line with a 0.2 or 0.22 micron in-line filter for administration.

additionalnotes.value: If ANC is greater than or equal to 1.5 AND Plts are greater than or equal to 100 x 109/L: Give as ordered. If ANC is less than 1.5 OR Plts are less than 100 x109/L: Delay 1 week.

If ANC is greater than or equal to 1.5 AND Plts are greater than or equal to 100 x 109/L: Give as ordered. If ANC is less than 1.5 OR Plts are less than 100 x109/L: Hold chemotherapy and contact physician.

If ANC is greater than or equal to 1.5 AND Plts are greater than or equal to 100 x 109/L: Give as ordered. If ANC is less than 1.5 OR Plts are less than 100 x109/L: Hold chemotherapy and contact physician.

population.value: Adjuvant PACLitaxel/CARBOplatin. Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
PACLitaxel / CARBOplatin. Advanced / Metastatic Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
PACLitaxel/CARBOplatin (Weekly) and concurrent RT. Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer.

backgroundinformation.value: Invert bag gently approximately 6 times prior to administration. Use a non-DEHP line with a 0.2 to 0.22 micron in-line filter for administration.
